name: Plesyte
description: Plesyte is a mysterious young pokemon, shrouded in a purple cosmic armor. It can often be found in dark caves, and some say that it has the power to tap into the cosmic energies that reside there. Plesyte is highly attuned to its surroundings, spending its days absorbing the atmosphere of the underground and gathering knowledge with its Mindzap ability. It has a mysterious aura that can be felt within the confines of the caves, as if it is protecting them.
image_prompt: Plesyte::0 a young epic psychic-type toad pokemon::2.5, wearing purple cosmic armor, in a cave environment, pink bokeh lighting, anime sketch with watercolor --niji --ar 3:2
